imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Gym management app logo mark, modern fitness style (gym-logo.dim_512x512.png)
- Wide hero/banner illustration featuring gym equipment silhouettes and abstract motion shapes (gym-hero.dim_1600x600.png)

existing_features.title: Implement Internet Identity sign-in and maintain an authenticated session in the UI; gate all gym management features behind authentication.
Add backend and UI for membership plans and member memberships, including: plans (name, price, billing period), assigning a plan to a member, start/end dates, and current membership status.
Add backend and UI for payment tracking, including recording payments (member, amount, date, method, notes) and viewing payment history per member.
Add backend and UI for attendance/check-ins, including: recording a check-in for a member (timestamp) and viewing attendance history and basic totals (e.g., last 30 days).
Add backend and UI for class scheduling, including: classes (title, instructor, capacity, date/time, duration) and member enrollments/registrations.
Add a simple role/permissions model where the canister stores a list of admin principals; only admins can manage members, plans, payments, attendance, and classes.

Create a coherent, consistent visual theme for the app (colors, typography, spacing, and layout) suitable for a gym/fitness product; apply it across all screens using Tailwind and existing UI components.

Implement primary UI pages and navigation: Dashboard (key counts), Members (list + search), Member Detail (tabs for profile/membership/payments/attendance), Plans, Classes (schedule view), and Settings (admin management).
Add generated static image assets to support branding and the landing/sign-in experience, and render them from the frontend static assets directory.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add backend data models and CRUD APIs for gym members, including: member profile (name, contact fields), status (active/inactive), and creation/update timestamps.

projectName: Gym management app (members, plans, classes, attendance)
